game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - Original Arkham Batmobile
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 오리지널 아캄 어사일럼 배트모빌과 함께 고담시의 가장 악명 높은 빌런들을 점령하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Seize control from Gotham City’s most notorious villains with the original Arkham Asylum Batmobile.
